## Due This Week: [Problem Set 8](../problemsets/ps8.qmd)

## Readings & Reference Material

### Lecture: Social Network Visualization

### Reading

- Core Reading
    - Ognyanova, ["Static and dynamic network visualization with R"](https://kateto.net/network-visualization)
    - **DMSS**, ch 13
- Reference Materials
    - Newman, [Networks](https://doi.org/10.1093/oso/9780198805090.001.0001).  
        - A technical and highly interdisciplinary look at networks, spanning physical networks, biological networks, social networks, and more.  Comprehensive, lots of network theory.
    - Menczer, Fortuanto, and Davis, [A First Course in Network Science](https://doi.org/10.1017/9781108653947).  
        - A short introduction focused on networks in a broad sense, with a focus on computation for network analysis in Python.
    - Jackson, [Social and Economic Network Analysis](https://press.princeton.edu/books/paperback/9780691148205/social-and-economic-networks).  
        - As befits the name, a focus on economic and social networks.
    - Scott, [Social Network Analysis](https://doi.org/10.4135/9781529716597).  
        - An introduction for beginners, with a focus on substance over computation.
